title: Enchanting Floral Diamond Grand Haaram Set with Matching Jhumkas
materials: E-F Color). Features a signature Hyderabadi Polish for exceptional luster and durability.
features: A breathtaking floral motif forms the core of this Grand Haaram, intricately handcrafted with individual petal-shaped settings. The repeating patterns evoke traditional South Indian designs, while the modern geometric links add a contemporary flair. The matching Jhumkas mirror the necklace's design, ensuring a cohesive and luxurious ensemble. Delicate teardrop-shaped dangles add movement and sparkle.
colors: Two-Tone Gold: The warm yellow gold provides a classic base
while the white gold accents highlight the brilliance of the diamonds. The diamonds themselves are colorless (E-F range).
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaaham/Pelli)
or milestone celebrations. A statement piece ideal for brides or anyone looking to make a lasting impression. Also suitable for high-end cultural events and galas.
description: This stunning necklace set showcases exceptional craftsmanship and blends traditional design elements with a modern aesthetic. The use of high-quality diamonds and 18K gold ensures lasting value and brilliance. Its intricate detailing and exquisite finish make it a true heirloom piece, a symbol of timeless elegance and refined taste. The Hyderabadi Polish guarantees exceptional shine and resistance to wear, ensuring it remains a cherished possession for generations.
